about_the_game:
Southwest of the royal capital of Asserya lies the mountainous trade city of Kaldesta, where a mysterious archaeological site was recently discovered. Recently, an earthquake swallowed up the city and split it in two. Now the area is divided between north and south, and many adventurers have traveled there searching for treasure. However, news of a curse affecting these aspiring adventurers has begun to spread. The Magician's Guild catches wind of this and sends the young apprentice Magetano to investigate.

What will Magetano discover during her investigation? Find out in The Curse of Kubel!


Gather information and venture into the chasm to investigate the source of the curse. Defeat dangerous monsters and lay claim to valuable items as you make your way through the underground dungeon.








New Voiced Lines
Hear Magetano's voice as you join her on her journey.

New Character Art
Enjoy the story once again with brand-new standing art. Feel the characters' emotions through their expressions and relive the experience of The Curse of Kubel.

content_descriptors.notes: The Curse of Kubel+ contains strong language.

detailed_description:
Southwest of the royal capital of Asserya lies the mountainous trade city of Kaldesta, where a mysterious archaeological site was recently discovered. Recently, an earthquake swallowed up the city and split it in two. Now the area is divided between north and south, and many adventurers have traveled there searching for treasure. However, news of a curse affecting these aspiring adventurers has begun to spread. The Magician's Guild catches wind of this and sends the young apprentice Magetano to investigate.

What will Magetano discover during her investigation? Find out in The Curse of Kubel!


Gather information and venture into the chasm to investigate the source of the curse. Defeat dangerous monsters and lay claim to valuable items as you make your way through the underground dungeon.








New Voiced Lines
Hear Magetano's voice as you join her on her journey.

New Character Art
Enjoy the story once again with brand-new standing art. Feel the characters' emotions through their expressions and relive the experience of The Curse of Kubel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Return to Asserya and revisit your favorite characters with all-new character art and voiced lines! Unlock new events as you traverse the fearsome Kaldestan Chasm and save the city of Kaldesta again!
